pages.text: Traveling in Space asteroids will approach your planet from time to time. So close that you can observe them, and send Mining Rocket to acquire large amount of resources.
Mining rocket will fly to the asteroid. Mine it, and return back with stacks of ores and gems.
The flow is the same as planet research. Just do not forget, mining rocket will get back to the same launch pad.
Using Rocket Assembler, Cargo Unloader, Launch Pad Tower and computers you can fully automate this process.
